title: Dear permabanned people, please learn from Bill

replies.body: get out of here with that Bill crap. He's everywhere. Down with Bill!

Alright, fine -_-

http://i.imgur.com/j18L8Jw.jpg

There, ya happy?
Are you sure that isn't Taric?

If it were, that would be just......outrageous.

_inserts homo-moan_
A Homoan?
I know what that means! OMG I'M LAUGHING SO HARD!
Hahahaha

hahahahaha I don't... ... ... *sniffle*

Not sure if I should be sad, or grateful. I guess it depends on what it means.
The Taric Japanese voice has him sounding like he is climaxing for his death animation and that is the time it comes up in the video.

femistnazi
this offends me greatly

> [{quoted}](name=Intrepid 07,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3E0gcfPB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-24T07:17:09.057+0000)
>
> get out of here with that Bill crap. He's everywhere. Down with Bill!

The memes will never stop. Join the memesquad or get exterminated
https://40.media.tumblr.com/dfa41f1c354ccb2c9cb1644a520e825e/tumblr_o0si34WAqe1rma2o1o1_500.png
That keyboard tho ... Is Bill an {{champion:55}} main?
From the looks of it, I think he is very close to becoming a {{champion:30}} main.
don't dis karth, nobody knows who he is

His head is too far up to be a Katarina main.

Everyone knows that a good Katarina main has their face perpetually lying on the keyboard to faceroll at will.
Rofl haha

Bill only has three buttons.

Probably a Teemo or Vayne player.

>Vayne

I wonder how badly you got destroyed by one of the more mechanically difficult ADCs to want to say that.

I have no issue with Vayne as a champion.

However, Vayne and Teemo are two of the very few champions who only have three active abilities and two purely passive abilities.  Varus is another example.

If you were to play with only three buttons on your keyboard, you would want champions with only three active abilities and who typically purchase items without actives.

Doesn't Vayne generally build Blade of the Ruined King? Mercurial Scimitar is also pretty strong for the cleanse.

And Teemo may consider Zhonya's Hourglass!

And you wouldn't be able to ping or type... :/

I don't think there is any Champion that can be played to their full potential with only three buttons. :(
Really? I've still seen them building Bork, but that's anecdotal evidence and not really representative of the Vayne population. You're probably right though! x3
ashe maybe? haha i don't even play much league but isn't her q just passive and can't be activated

My apologies, usually when somebody goes and says something about the amount of buttons you need to play a champion (i.e Master Yi has two buttons) they say it because they lose a lot to a certain champion and/or they're just joining in on the circlejerk.
Understandable mistake.
Except that i actually say "Muted and reported" before i do so, in hopes of that person being able to reflect on how did he/she behave.

That never works.

It just makes them angrier.
I honestly don't care. Their loss, then.

You're just making them more mad. You can be stubborn and keep on saying that like a douchebag, or just mute em and keep playing the game.

There's absolutely no valid reason to say "Muted & reported" before muting someone
Good make them more angry then their true personalty shines through! Don't need those type in gaming.
Bill is chill
When you get that sweet message that a player has been punished. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
https://i.gyazo.com/1ac2710adaf06db55883ed19d898b845.png

this post is gold. I am tired of these players who pretend they have muted someone who is toxic (who they basically aggravated by not playing safe, feeding repeatedly, and getting caught 40 mins into the game causing their whole team to lose) and then reporting that player who gets a chat restriction imposed on him while they walk away with no punishment for their unsportsmanlike behavior and refusal to listen to pings/advice. They don't cooperate with the team but they get easily butt hurt or they simply bait other players into becoming toxic so they can report them. This kind of behavior should not go unpunished.
I wish I could upvote this more. THIS is how reality looks like, not this shit picture in the starrting post!
Yep. This. Riot needs to weed out the players that are bad, and place them with the other bad players.

well it's not weed out bad players but climbing is a struggle and it very easy to just get on a smurf for people and go be "sorry just bad" low elo.
If a laner dies early and everyone is like "it's cool just play safe" they come back to lane and continue to overextend not playing safe and die again.
It gives me massive anxiety because of the pressure 1 person is now putting on the game by feeding 1 snowball champ before the jungler has even made a clear.
At that point people will say "OK, plz just sit on tower and farm the best you can. We will help as soon as we lvl" but they REFUSE and just continue to not play safe at all.
It's not being "bad" its them clearly trying to push your buttons. If someone says that to me, no problem because I want to win.
Can I atleast tell them they look like a grapefruit with pinecones?
I called someone an onion face once.
that's too mean bruh.

Let the ~~wookie~~ bully win.

If you get mad at being flamed, *you* are the bad guy.

that's not the right answer, but it seems your getting there. if someone is flaming you, step one is to accept a loss because flamers are useless in teamfights. step two is to mute and report them without typing anything back. step three is never seeing that person again.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=3E0gcfPB,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-24T08:45:24.536+0000)
>
> that's not the right answer, but it seems your getting there. if someone is flaming you, step one is to accept a loss because flamers are useless in teamfights. step two is to mute and report them without typing anything back. step three is never seeing that person again.

Good luck on that one. I have multiple tickets where I have reported a troll/flamer and get him on my team the very next game.
Just wait 5 min after the game, and unless you're in high elo you won't see him again...

You say that shit like those people will ever actually be in a team fight. Your just one of the kids who talk shit thats why you want them to be allowed to push people around. Riot won't do shit to them thats why they removed the tribunal so they could keep their beloved 98% by choosing a handful of people to get banned and the rest go free.
no, I'm just trying to tell people that they actually can't push people around alone, they need to be let in first. kind of like a classic vampire, they can't hurt you unless you let them.

DON'T LISTEN TO IT!!!

He's fooling you! Bill is actually Cho'Gath in disguise! Oh, the horr-

{{champion:31}} OM NOM NOM NOM! Oh, dear? Where are my manners? Come in, my friend!
